#summary Overview over the MIST board

http://mist-board.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/mist12.png


  * Altera Cyclone EP3C25 FPGA
  * 32 MBytes 16 bit wide SDR SDRAM
  * AT91SAM7S56 ARM IO controller
  * MAX3421E USB host controller
  * TUSB2046 USB HUB
  * 4 USB host ports
  * 3*6 bit analog VGA output
  * stereo analog audio output
  * Powered from Micro USB charger
  * Fully user configurable
  * 100% open source
